sentence.Network_en: Paul asked Tara out to dinner but she gave him the brush-off .
sentence.Network_cn: 保罗邀请塔拉外出吃饭，但遭到拒绝。

sentence.Network_en: These guests were given a brush off.
I wanted to keep in touch, but when I called him he gave me the brush-off.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想和他保持联系，但当我打电话给他时，他却不理睬我。

entry.def: If someone gives you the brush-off when you speak to them, they refuse to talk to you or be nice to you.

example.ex: I wanted to keep in touch, but when I called him he gave me the brush-off.
example.tran: 我想和他保持联系，但当我打电话给他时，他却不理睬我。
